execution_plan.description: Retrieve all order IDs from the Orders table (all orders in the system).
Retrieve distinct order IDs that have at least one shipment (orders that have been shipped).

Get invoice numbers and their statuses for invoices whose invoice_number corresponds to an order_id from step 1 but excluding those order_ids that have shipments (i.e., orders not shipped yet). This assumes invoice_number can be compared to order_id to associate invoices with orders.
execution_plan.query: SELECT invoice_number, invoice_status_code FROM Invoices WHERE invoice_number IN ($step1.order_id) AND invoice_number NOT IN ($step2.order_id);
